overview: Dono, Kasino, and Indro (played by the Warkop Trio) are hired as puppet ballet dancers. Their jokes and fighting stunts, delight the audience. But soon after, Gozal, a real estate businessman acquires the land, where the puppet ballet building sits on. The dispute over the land and its certificate becomes the filmâ€™s satire. Finally, Dono and friends challenge the champions of Gozal to a boxing match.
title: Saya Suka Kamu Punya
